name: Akasha: A Bird's Calling
description:
Summary

You’re a bird who has been exiled from your home by a corrupt council for the crime of singing. Not only are you cast from your home, but your beloved singing voice is taken from you… In this land of exiles oppressed by the evil council, interact with birds that are there for various crimes - from feather-snatching to tax fraud -  while finding a way to get your song back...

_________________________________________________________

The Game

Akasha:  A Bird’s Calling  is a 2D side-scrolling narrative game with minor puzzle elements. Explore an interesting and unique world with a compelling narrative and fun characters! We hope you enjoy our Thesis project!

A Game By:

Jessica Piszczek

Maddie Hand

Min Young Lee

Trailer song by Spectacular Sound!
